Package com.anji.nn.activationfunction

Interface Summary
ActivationFunction Abstracts activation function for neurons.
ActivationFunctionNonIntegrating  
 

Class Summary
AbsoluteActivationFunction Absolute activation function.
ActivationFunctionFactory Factory to hide implementation details of creating activation functions and ensure there is always only one of each.
BipolarSigmoidActivationFunction Modified classic sigmoid.
ClampedAbsoluteActivationFunction Absolute activation function.
ClampedLinearActivationFunction  
ConvertToSignedActivationFunction  
CosineActivationFunction Cosine activation function.
DivideActivationFunction Divide activation function (divides first input by second input).
EvSailSigmoidActivationFunction Modified classic sigmoid.
GaussianActivationFunction Gaussian activation function.
InverseAbsActivationFunction Inverse absolute value.
LinearActivationFunction Linear activation function.
LogicActivationFunction Absolute activation function.
LogicAndActivationFunction Logic AND activation function.
LogicOrActivationFunction Logic OR activation function.
LogicXORActivationFunction Logic XOR activation function.
NegatedLinearActivationFunction Negative linear activation function.
RampActivationFunction Ramp activation function.
RecipriocalActivationFunction Reciprocal function (inverse).
SigmoidActivationFunction Modified classic sigmoid.
SignedClampedLinearActivationFunction  
SignedStepActivationFunction Step activation function.
SineActivationFunction Sine activation function.
StepActivationFunction Step activation function.
TanhActivationFunction Hyperbolic tangent.
TanhCubicActivationFunction Hyperbolic tangent modified to have a "well" around 0.
